title: Stateful vs Stateless Systems
subtext: Compare systems that maintain state with those that don't
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Stateful vs Stateless Systems
texts: In stateful systems, the server stores information about the client's session. Stateless systems do not store this data, treating each request as independent.
Imagine stateful systems as having a memory of past interactions, whereas stateless systems have no recollection of previous encounters.
